Description.Text: Location This establishment is located in the beautiful Puerto Escondido near Playa Zicatela Beach and Playa Marino, which meet in front of the hotel, giving a unique and unforgettable view. The hotel is located just 10 minutes from the centre of town and the international airport. Facilities Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the bungalow complex include a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the bungalow complex feature a playground and an attractive garden. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage or car park. Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Among the additional services available are medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. The kitchenette features tea and coffee making equipment. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone and a TV. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each accommodation unit includes a bathroom with a shower. Sports/Entertainment The bungalow complex offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. The bungalow complex offers massage treatments (for a fee).
